523460.name: Fantasy Skin Bundle (or "Buy Us an Energy Drink") - Trimmer Tycoon
523460.description:
Fly, you fools!

Trimmer Tycoon's Fantasy Skin Bundle includes five brand new customer skins. The skins are based on characters from fantasy movies and games. Spice up the game with even more variety and colorfulness! The new characters will be added into all customer tiers.

This pack includes the following skins:
- Commoner
- Knight
- Elf
- Orc
- Wizard

This DLC is meant as a way to support us with little donations while getting awesome content in return. Please see the other DLCs (Improx Skin Bundle, Sports Skin Bundle and Holiday Skin Bundle) for different money amounts and even more awesome skins.
523460.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
